title: Futurama
resume: The adventures of a late-20th-century New York City pizza delivery boy, Philip J. Fry, who, after being unwittingly cryogenically frozen for one thousand years, finds employment at Planet Express, an interplanetary delivery company in the retro-futuristic 31st century.
character: Fry / Professor Farnsworth / Zoidberg / Zapp Brannigan (voice)
